title: Women Investing in the School of Education Fund
description: To support faculty research, scholarships and programming in the School of Education at the University of Colorado Boulder.
marketingContent: The Women Investing in the School of Education (WISE) giving circle is comprised of local and national women who support the core values and beliefs of the School of Education and believe in the power of education to change lives. Members include alumnae and friends, teachers, retired teachers, and those involved in education in other ways. WISE Members award annual grants to many teaching, research, and outreach initiatives in the School that may otherwise go unfunded. Through this direct involvement, members learn about the innovative partnerships that are taking place in our local schools and communities.
